titleStmt.title: A brief discovery of the chief causes, signs, and effects, of that most reigning disease, the scurvy together with the causes, symptoms, & effects, of several other dangerous diseases most usually afflicting mankind. Bromfield; and now wholly assigned by him to Mr. Joseph Stent.
